active_learning.discussion_prompt: In groups, debate the trade-offs of automated vs. manual preventative maintenance scheduling for physical security assets like CCTV and access controls. Use real-world examples, such as HVAC failures contributing to data center breaches (e.g., environmental damage in the 2017 Maersk NotPetya incident), to argue how poor scheduling amplifies cyber-physical risks. Synthesize consensus recommendations for hybrid approaches.
